admin/adyen.title: Adyen
admin/adyen.settings.adyenApiKey.label: Adyen API Key
admin/adyen.settings.adyenWebhookUsernam: Enter your Adyen webhook user name
admin/adyen.settings.vtexAppKey.label: VTEX App Key
admin/adyen.settings.vtexAppToken.label: VTEX App Token
admin/adyen.settings.vtexAppToken.helpTe: Enter a VTEX app key and token pair for this account. If you are configuring a marketplace-seller relationship, use a key and token that have permissions for all related accounts.
admin/adyen.settings.productionAPI.label: Adyen API Production Endpoint
admin/adyen.settings.productionAPI.helpT: Enter your Adyen API production endpoint
admin/adyen.settings.adyenPlatforms.help: Activate to use Adyen for Platforms to processs split payouts. The Adyen for Platforms app must be installed
admin/adyen.saveSettings.failure: Error saving settings (see console for details)
Enter the Adyen production API URI. Ensure that it is in the form of http://{productionURI}.com
